verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: welcomed] [ARG1: a wide - array of NCAA champion sports teams] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] and posed for photos with athletes .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] welcomed a wide - array of NCAA champion sports teams to the White House on Friday and [V: posed] [ARG1: for photos with athletes] .
